CONNECT4.description: This is a two player game. Try to stack coins. Q/E - move left/right, W - drop a coin. There is no winner detection

GUESS.description: Think of a number between 1 - 63. If that number is on the screen press W, otherwise any other key.

HIDDEN.description: Find cards with the same symbol. Press 5 to show hightlighted card. 2/Q/E/S - move up/left/right/down.

MERLIN.description: Remember in which order squares are lighted. Q/W/A/S - top-left/top-right/bottom-left/bottom-right.

PONG.description: This is a two player game. Controls: 1/Q and 4/E.

PONG2.description: This is a two player game. Controls: 1/Q and 4/E.

SYZYGY.description: Grab food to get longer. A/S - left/right, 3/E - up/down. F - start. C - continue after game over.

TANK.description: Shoot targets. 2/S - down/up, Q/E - left/right, W - shoot.

TETRIS.description: Q - rotate, W/E - left/right, A - down.

TICTAC.description: This is a two player game. Place noughts and crosses.

VERS.description: Player 1: A/Z - up/down, 1/2 - left right. Player 2: 4/R - up/down, C/V - left right.
